title: Which are the most reputed CE certification bodies? - Quora

response.answer_text: Nowadays CE certification becoming mandatory in many countries. Make your product certified with our most reputed CE marking consultancy at meddevicecorp which is Internationally approved by all countries. We are providing quick and best CE certification for all your CE certification bodies. Meddevicecorp assures 100% Trusted Service with customer satisfaction. We extended our service in ISO 13485, FDA 510(K), Drug Master File, US FDA Registration, Clinical evaluation, 510k submission and more. We provide all these certifications for Medical Device, Drugs, Food, Cosmetics & Nutraceuticals For more details on CE certification bodies, contact us here at meddevicecorp.com

It is not about certification body. It is about quality of product. To get CE certificate you need to test your product in laboratory. This test reports define quality of your product and test reports needed to be submitted at certificate body if product fulfill quality requirement according to CE mark then you will be issue CE certificate. After this you can use CE mark for your product.
